@PeterWelch I have co-sponsored @janschakowsky's bill to set hospital staffing minimums and improve working conditions for nurses. Nurses are the backbone of our health system‚Äîit's time to invest in them accordingly.

@PeterWelch Nurses have been overworked and underpaid since before the pandemic and it's only gotten worse in the past 2+ years. 

They deserve the best rate of pay possible.
That is why I signed on to my colleague @peterwelch's letter asking for an investigation into the staffing agencies' practices. It does NOT call for and I would NOT support capping nurse pay.

Over the past two years, some staffing agencies have taken advantage of the nurse shortage by increasing prices 2 or 3 times the pre-pandemic rates. 

Unfortunately in many cases, 40% of fees charged by agencies have NOT gone to the nurses themselves.
